sentences.en: a film review
sentences.cn: 影评

sentences.en: a journalist who will review the events of the past six months
sentences.cn: 将对过去六个月里所发生的事件进行回顾的记者

sentences.en: a review of the year
sentences.cn: 对这一年的回顾

sentences.en: All fees are subject to review(= may be reviewed ).
sentences.cn: 所有费用有待审查。

sentences.en: Bradman will review the best of the new children’s books.
sentences.cn: 布拉德曼将为这些新的儿童读物中最优秀的作品撰写书评。

sentences.en: Chomsky's review is entitled "Psychology and Ideology".
sentences.cn: 乔姆斯基的这篇评论题为《心理学与意识形态》。

sentences.en: I’ve got to revise my geography.
sentences.cn: 我得复习一下地理。

sentences.en: If you have to cover 12 chapters in American history, begin by planning on three two-hour reviews with four chapters per session.
sentences.cn: 如果你必须涵盖美国史的12个章节，首先计划3次2小时的复习，每次4章。

sentences.en: Mr Crowther asked for judicial review of the decision(= an examination of the decision by a judge ).
sentences.cn: 克劳瑟先生要求对判决进行司法审查。

sentences.en: Salaries are kept under constant review.
sentences.cn: 薪金问题要一直不断审订.

sentences.en: She's the literary editor of the "Sunday Review".
sentences.cn: 她是《星期天评论》的文学编辑。

sentences.en: The aid allocation for Pakistan was still under review.
sentences.cn: 拨给巴基斯坦的援助物资仍在审核当中。

sentences.en: The bill provides for the automatic review of all death sentences.
sentences.cn: 该法案规定所有死刑判决都要自动接受审核。

sentences.en: The book received a favorable review.
sentences.cn: 这本书赢得了好评.

sentences.en: The company should put its claims up for review by an arbitrator.
sentences.cn: 公司应该将其要求交由仲裁者审核。

sentences.en: The critic padded out the review with quotation from the author.
sentences.cn: 这个评论家引用那个作家的话添凑了这篇评论.

sentences.en: The critic's review of the play was just a paragraph of bile.
sentences.cn: 那位批评家对这部戏剧的评论不过是在发泄怒气。

sentences.en: The decision will be reviewed by the Supreme Court.
sentences.cn: 这个判决将由最高法院复核。

sentences.en: The film opened to rave reviews (= reviews that praised it a lot ) .
sentences.cn: 这部电影好评如潮。

sentences.en: The government will review the situation later in the year.
sentences.cn: 政府将在今年晚些时候对形势重新加以研究。

sentences.en: The journal receives review copies(=  free copies to review ) of most new software products.
sentences.cn: 这家杂志会收到大多数新软件产品的赠样以作评论之用。

sentences.en: The matter is still under review.
sentences.cn: 这件事仍在审议中。

sentences.en: The policy comes up for review (= will be reviewed ) in April.
sentences.cn: 这项政策将在4月份予以审议。

sentences.en: The review body has produced a truncated version of its annual report.
sentences.cn: 该评论机构出版了其年报的删节版本。

sentences.en: The review is uncritical of the violence in the film.
sentences.cn: 这篇评论对影片宣扬暴力方面未作批判.

sentences.en: The soldiers were in full uniform for the review.
sentences.cn: 士兵们身着全套军礼服准备接受检阅.

sentences.en: The team manager’s position will be reviewed at the end of the season.
sentences.cn: 球队主教练的人选将在赛季末重新考虑。

sentences.en: We begin with a brief and necessarily incomplete review of UK statistics.
sentences.cn: 我们先简要地回顾一下英国的统计数字,当然还未全面.

sentences.en: We will review your situation and decide how we can help you.
sentences.cn: 我们会研究你的情况，然后决定如何帮助你。

sentences.en: We've never had a good review in the music press.
sentences.cn: 我们从未在音乐媒体获得过好评。

sentences.en: You won't catch me giving him a bad review!
sentences.cn: 我绝不会说他坏话的。

words.tran_cn: 回顾；复习；评论；检讨；检阅

phrases.tran_cn: 文献回顾；文献综述；文献评论
管理评审，管理审查；管理评论
服务表现检讨；业绩评价

trans.tran_cn: 评审，检查，评论，回顾，检阅，复习课
trans.tran_en: a careful examination of a situation or process
a report on a series of events or a period of time, that mentions the most important parts

trans.tran_cn: 审核，复查，回顾，反思，评论，检阅（部队），复习
trans.tran_en: to examine, consider, and judge a situation or process carefully in order to see if changes are necessary
a careful examination of a situation or process
to look again at something you have studied, such as notes, reports etc
an article in a newspaper or magazine that gives an opinion about a new book, play, film etc
